name: Heavy Beat Alpha 1
description:
Heavy Beat Public Alpha 1

In Heavy Beat, you traverse a randomly generated environment that reacts to the beat of the song! Any song! Be it the Official Soundtrack or your favorite beat that you love to jam to.

Choose your song and start moving! The further you travel the more points you score. Collect the randomly spawned diamonds for extra points. Use the environment and your movement to your advantage.

As the song plays, the beat keeps pushing you forward. Walk on top of the Chevron Tiles to gain Bonus Speed that decays over time, keep sliding and jumping in order to maintain your speed at the max!

Heavy Beat is currently in Public Alpha 1. Every month, a new Alpha version is released. You can follow its development on:  https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCcn663iXs4MOgHFe4syuRpw

Gameplay Controls:

WASD - Movement

MOUSE - Look Around

CTRL - Crouch/Slide while moving

UI Controls:

ENT - Confirm

ESC - Back

ARROWS + MOUSE - Clicking and Navigation

Minimum System Requirements:

Win10 (64bit)

3.0 GHz Processor

4 GB Video Card Memory

8 GB RAM

700MB  Storage Space
